articles.title: Google rolls out new vacation-planning features to Search, Maps, and Gemini - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is rolling out a slew of new features — some powered by AI — across Search, Maps, and Gemini that are designed to help people plan their summer
articles.content: Google is rolling out a slew of new features some powered by AI across Search, Maps, and Gemini that are designed to help people plan their summer vacations. The new features arrive as users have bee… [+2193 chars]
